headline: 3 Top-Ranked Invesco Mutual Funds to Buy Now for Solid Returns
summary: Below, we share with you three Invesco mutual funds, namely MLPTX, VSMCX and ACSDX. Each has earned a Zacks Mutual Fund Rank #1.
